1. 自動BLOCK迅雷, QQ, 百度離線, Xfplay(影音先鋒) PEER
2. 閂qBittorrent就會重置IP Filter list

v3.3.11.2
3. 新增IP Filter API (供進階使用者使用, 如: 利用API編寫自動封鎖指定IP程式)
4. Web/API登入失敗記錄 (記錄登入IP位址及嘗試次數, 原版本為5次登入失敗後會自動封鎖, 但沒有提供記錄給使用者參閱)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

若要使用IP Filter API
請先啟用WebUI功能(Tools>>Options>>Web UI>>Enable)
qBittorrent WebUI API Doc: https://github.com/qbittorrent/qBittorrent/wiki/WebUI-API-Documentation

IP Filter API使用方法:
POST method:
http://ipaddress:port/command/banip
Post Field:
1. ipv4/v6 address
2. 冇啦 你仲想要D咩

例子:
post ip: "1.2.3.4" / "DDDD:EEEE:AAAADDD:BBBB:EEEE:EEEE:FFFF"
Empty message: IP field should not be empty.
Success message: Done. / Logging("Manually banning peer '1.2.3.4' via API...") / Logging("Manually banning peer 'DDDD:EEEE:AAAADDD:BBBB:EEEE:EEEE:FFFF' via API...")
IP Exist message: The given IP address already exists.
IP Invalid message: The given IP address is not valid.

完

v3.3.11.3
1. 重寫部分封鎖功能並轉為臨時封鎖IP，以免經常改動設定檔，而相關設定亦還原為永久封鎖IP之用
2. IP Filter API改為臨時封鎖IP(若要永久封鎖指定IP 請使用GUI進行/自行修改設定檔/利用內置的IP Filter)
3. 為方便用家清除設定檔下的永久封鎖列表("IPFilter\BannedIPs")，新增一個退出qBittorrent時清空IPFilter選項
4. 如有更新，更新提示框會帶有是次更新內容

完

睇完D CODE 唔係用user agent
有一樣野唔知你係咪搞錯左
BT係用緊peerid黎分你用緊咩client
而唔係用user agent, user agent只會用係http tracker/web seed
同埋BT protocol 大家只會SD個peerid+PIECE+blahhh過去 係唔存在D咩user agent
如果唔係用peerid去parse番出黎
係只有Magnet冇Tracker下 咁樣係認唔到對方用緊既client係咩

而peer.client()就係解完peer id出黎既產物(BT軟件名稱+版本)
所以我用呢個方法黎block迅雷大概係冇錯
除非佢連peer id都spoof到啦

下面係用左utorrent同迅雷黎做測試
亂碼果D係peer id, 而後面果個名係我用libtorrent既identify_client function解出黎既 亦即係peer.client()


參考:
https://wiki.theory.org/BitTorrentSpecification#peer_id

其實我咁諗,係因為qBittorrent 有個Anonymous Mode可以hide client's fingerprint
我冇安迅雷, 所以唔知佢有冇Anonymous Mode
https://github.com/qbittorrent/qBittorrent/wiki/Anonymous-Mode

如果真係開左Anonymous Mode, 可以估下個IP係唔係中國, 係就BAN佢

fingerprint其實就係peerid 準確d黎講就係後面堆野
eg: -qB33B0-(123456789012)
括住入面果堆就係fingerprint 12個位
8位版本+12個位fingerprint=peer id

libtorrent API DOC:
anonymous_mode defaults to false. When set to true, the client tries to hide its identity to a certain degree. The peer-ID will no longer include the client's fingerprint.
http://www.rasterbar.com/products/libtorrent/manual.html#peer-info

不過，安全起見，下個版本會tostring埋個peerid黎check

迅雷應該就冇Anonymous Mode(試晒咁多個版本 B竹黎都係搵唔到呢樣野or點連都係冇
呢樣功能係得小部分client先有
始終個連線限制太大

FAQ都有講:
I configured qBittorrent to not download some files in a torrent but they still appear on my hard disk, why is that?

As you may know, a torrent is split into pieces of equal size that do not take files into consideration. As a consequence, a piece can contain information relative to more than one file and qBittorrent only operates at piece level. Because of this, if two files are adjacent and you choose to download only one of them, it is likely that the filtered one will be partially downloaded and thus appear on the hard-disk.

v3.3.16 changelog:

BUGFIX: Better memory footprint when using libtorrent 1.1.x. The cache is turned off by default(0 (disabled) value in the settings). The value -1 (auto) makes it use 1/8 of your RAM. (sledgehammer999)
BUGFIX: Skip user input events when adding torrent. Closes #7327. (glassez)
BUGFIX: Avoid memory leak in the speed graph. (Chocobo1)
WEBUI: Fix validating wrong header field. X-Forwarded-Host is a foreign proxy setting, it isn't the same as qbt's local setting and thus it makes no sense to verify it. Closes #7311. (Chocobo1)
WINDOWS: Fix connection problems when a specific interface/ip is configured. (sledgehammer999)
WINDOWS: Disable skipping of loopback interfaces. This fixes the absence of VPN tunnel interfaces under Windows and works around the QTBUG-32349. Fixes #7291. (Evengard)
WINDOWS: The installer detects the 64bit running process too. (vlakoff)

Wednesday November 22nd 2017 - qBittorrent v4.0.1 release

This is a hotfix release. It is also build against newer libtorrent code that fixes connectivity issues with proxies.
v4.0.1 changelog:

BUGFIX: Fix crash on opening torrent/magnet (uninitialized pointer). Closes #7739 #7723. (sledgehammer999)
BUGFIX: Enable preferences Apply button when ip banlist is modified (Thomas Piccirello)
BUGFIX: Allow drag-n-drop magnet links to mainwindow. Closes #7742. (Chocobo1)
BUGFIX: Fix crash when aborting a torrent creation process. Closes #7783. (Chocobo1)
BUGFIX: Correctly check if torrent passed during application start already exists. (sledgehammer999)
WEBUI: Add ip subnet whitelist for bypassing webui auth (Thomas Piccirello)
WEBUI: Fix logo missing in login page (Chocobo1)
COSMETIC: Fix english typo. (sledgehammer999)
OTHER: cmake: qtsingleapplication should always be built statically (luigino)

replies.msg:
其實係D檔案放埋左一齊方便做hash check
以下面段野為例 就係將Piece2 4.jpg放左係parts檔案入面

係咁既, 所有檔案分散晒做成千上萬既PIECE
每塊PIECE都有可能SAVE左唔同既檔案係入邊

Eg:
有一粒SEED 我只係想DOWN 1-3.jpg 唔DOWN 4.jpg
Piece1: 1-2.jpg
Piece2: 2-4.jpg
Piece3: 4.jpg
2同3.jpg係SAVE係Piece2
而呢張4.jpg 因為係有部分放左係Piece2到
咁我都係要DOWN晒成個Piece1-2落黎同埋SKIP左舊Piece3
但呢個4.jpg 因為SAVE左係Piece2
佢要DOWN埋果小部分野 咁先係完整既piece
每個piece都有一個hash 呢個hash係用黎檢查Piece完整性
對番成塊野係咪一樣 唔一樣既就會繼續向其他人request同一個Piece 直至一樣為止
跟住4.jpg呢小部分野就會移左去.unwanted folder到

replies.msg:
DL/ UL speed/Status bar係計晒payload+overhead
torrent list果個speed先係實數(payload)
overhead就係你transfer/receive果堆data時所產生既數據

簡單D講
姐係堆data加密左, 你收到+解密完後
payload就係你實際收到既data(當1MB)
overhead就係用加密包住左"實際data"既data(當100KB)
咁DL speed就係1.1MB

quote.msg:
DL/ UL speed/Status bar係計晒payload+overhead
torrent list果個speed先係實數(payload)
overhead就係你transfer/receive果堆data時所產生既數據

簡單D講
姐係堆data加密左, 你收到+解密完後
payload就係你實際收到既data(當1MB)
overhead就係用加密包住左"實際data"既data(當100KB)
咁DL speed就係1.1MB
我睇graph overhead好少，但係total speed可以同torrent list 相差幾MB至10MB以上
